column4: hi guys, sure you've heard this one before but can't find a straight answer online - in 11.04 how can i restart networking? service networking restart doesnt work and /etc/init.d/networkign restart has been depriciated
go up to the clock area and click on the network icon and uncheck the box, then recheck the box for your network connection
my system doesnt have the connections tab at the top where clock is...
